instruction:
Using the information from the {context_type} given below, summarize a paragraph-long response to the following user query.
Here are some input-output examples. Read the examples carefully to figure out the mapping. The output of the last example is not given, and your job is to figure out what it is.
__description__: Template from https://arxiv.org/pdf/2305.14303 for query-focused summarization over tables
